Job Description
Job Summary: Operational Training of end customer NOC staff on capacity management, troubleshooting, fault management, change management, and fault resolution of reported and detected faults, within the Arista Cloudvision telemetry management solution.
These roles involve working with a highly automated global network deployment, therefore experience writing software is essential.
There are 2 main areas of focus involved in these roles:
Automation and testing: Using the latest automation techniques and tools
Cloud services: Implementing and operating scalable, flexible and cloud agnostic solutions for internal and external customers
Qualifications
US Citizen
10+ years experience
Working-level experience in Datacenter Switching Network Operations which includes; network device monitoring, device failures, communication line alarms (such as bit errors, framing errors, line coding errors, and circuits down) and other performance issues that may affect the network or any datacenter devices.
Arista Data Center Switching knowledge is desirable
Minimum Education and Experience:
Minimum 7+ years of technical support experience
Minimum 7+ years of experience and understanding of event/alert management, incident and change management processes
Minimum 7+ years of experience of basic networking, routers, switches, Firewalls, and Wireless devices.
Must possess a strong understanding of Route/Switch, Wireless.
Automation Experience - (Ansible, Terraform) - Desired
Scripting Experience - (Bash, Python)
Job Type: Full-time
Pay: $65.00 per hour
Benefits:
401(k)
Dental insurance
Health insurance
Vision insurance
Schedule:
8 hour shift
Monday to Friday
Ability to commute/relocate:
Richmond, VA: Reliably commute or planning to relocate before starting work (Required)
Application Question(s):
Due to the nature of the role, US Citizenship is required. Do you possess US Citizenship?
Education:
Bachelor's (Preferred)
Experience:
Network engineering: 8 years (Preferred)
Data center: 5 years (Preferred)
Cloud: 5 years (Preferred)
Scripting: 5 years (Preferred)
Automation: 3 years (Preferred)
NOC (Network Operations Center): 3 years (Preferred)
Work Location: In person
